body: Holy Molly, this is so good! The hypnosis/teacher doujinshi is so damn hot. It is actually now my all time favorite!
Whatever ill accept it since its fiction this is going to my fave list

The teacher used the boy to get his way with the girl that part fucked me over i don't know if i should like it or if i should dislike it god damn it i wanted that boy to take her virginity at least not that fucking ugly ass teacher god damn it what am i thinking i sound so pedophelic -_-
